reviewText: Item was brand new. After playing it the DVD player all of the images had lines across the screen. Worthless.

Screen Dreams Living Earth is really just a screensaver for your TV. It is not something you would want to sit down and watch for an extended period of time. The first setting allows you to watch 40 pictures in about three minutes. You can set this to go slower if you like. The pictures are all pretty much static, no "living" earth scenes like moving waterfalls or clouds, etc. So this was not quite what I expected. The music is however good and you get three choices. The guitar music is nice. So basically this is for background ambience and not something you'd actively watch. If you want something spectacular I can recommend: The Delta Sleep System - This has moving scenes of nature that are completely beautiful and awe inspiring. ~The Rebecca Review

I enjoyed this playing on my big TV while hosting a party and everyone found it entertaining while mingling & wanted to know how I purchased it. It's also a great diversion when the chatter slows off and on. Rated "G" of course. Highly recommended.
